Abstrak: An interview with contemporary composer Keith Kramer in the U.S. is presented. He discusses his concert album "Beyond Sonic Boundaries Live! 2010," which was performed at the Merkin Hall in New York at the end of 2010. Kramer reveals the inspiration of the strong visual impression and art direction of the album. He also shares his view about electro-acoustic music and the significance of the title pieces in his music album.
Sumber: Fanfare: The Magazine for Serious Record Collectors. Mar/Apr2016, Vol. 39 Issue 4, p122-128. 7p
